/gu.description: Generate visual guide with Gemini (Mermaid diagram)
/gu.args: Create a comprehensive visual diagram using Mermaid syntax showing: {{prompt}}. Use graph TD format with color coding, clear hierarchy, and detailed labels. Output ONLY the mermaid code block.

/status.description: Check Opta project status across all apps

steps.action: echo '\n=== Planning Status ===' && cat 8-Project/.planning/STATE.md 2>/dev/null || echo 'No STATE.md found'

/rust.description: Navigate to Rust core and show info
/rust.action: cd '1-Apps/1J-Optamize-MacOS/src-tauri' && pwd && echo '\n=== Workspace Members ===' && cargo metadata --no-deps --format-version 1 | jq -r '.workspace_members[]' 2>/dev/null || ls -la
